mapper.select: select tp.p_id , tp.name ,tp.gmt_create,tp.u_id ,tu.nick_name from t_user_plan up , t_plan tp ,t_user tu where up.p_id = tp.p_id and up.u_id = #{userId} and tu.u_id = tp.u_id order by tp.gmt_create desc

select tp.p_id , tp.name ,tp.gmt_create,tp.u_id ,tu.nick_name ,tp.praise_count , tp.evaluate_count,tp.detail_count,tp.image_main from t_plan tp ,t_user tu where tu.u_id = #{userId} and tu.u_id = tp.u_id order by tp.gmt_modify desc

select tcs.p_id , tcs.name ,tcs.gmt_create,tcs.u_id ,tcs.nick_name from t_plan_detail tpd , ( select tp.p_id , tp.name ,tp.gmt_create,tp.u_id ,tu.nick_name ,tp.gmt_modify from t_plan tp ,t_user tu where tp.p_id <> tp.u_id and tu.u_id = tp.u_id and tp.flag = 1 ) tcs where tpd.p_id = tcs.p_id group by tcs.p_id , tcs.name ,tcs.gmt_create,tcs.u_id ,tcs.nick_name having(count(*)) > 0 order by tcs.gmt_modify desc limit 50
